column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Amazing baguette amazing Croissant amazing macaroons. I haven't tried the food but I will. Don't get the tiramisu it needs work. Croissants are the best I've  had in the states besides  urth Café. Just got back from Paris and tel aviv. So I have a lot to compare it tooI they need to fill up cases with deserts it looks emty.
